resources.string: This application was created for a JP Morgan & Chase code assessment. It incorporates all of the tried and true Mine Sweeper game play that you have grown to love, with a new, polished, material design look. I made the decision to go with a consistent 9 column layout for the game board regardless of the game board difficulty chosen. This is not how the typical game is presented, but I felt this allowed much easier mobile oriented/one handed game play which adds to the experience. I hope you enjoy my version of this classic. Please leave some feedback on Google Play. Thanks!
The amount of mines left. But who knows if you placed your flags correctly...
The clock is ticking! Hurry up, this is how you will be ranked!
You have already flagged all supposed mines. Questioning yourself now, are you?
This is the leader board. You can create new users here. Press a user to switch to that profile. Long press to delete that user.
